short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A local-only extension that helps you make annotations for any web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A page annotation tool that can save all your notes within your browser *locally* (No Cloud Sync).

An extension that works for page annotation!

1. Select any page text, and annotate it with pre-picked highlight color
2. Right sidebar to view your notes for current page
3. Option page as a dashboard for all your notes
